Articles.Content:
Hello, when I try to launch a rocket via a stratolauncher, this stratolauncher disappear when the rocket reach 20 km from it...

 

This make cost in carrer mode, and the kerbals inside the stratolauncher dies...

 

Anyone have a solution ?

 

Here is an example of a crewed startolauncher :

 

 

Thanks and regards...

I believe there's a number of mods that address this problem, but in stock? No good answer. The best you've got is a Space-X style booster stage that can land itself, but that requires you to get the booster clear of the atmosphere, circularize the orbital stage, then switch back to controlling the booster before it hits the atmosphere again.
No way to increase the "switch ship" distance ?
There might be a mod that handles that?
I would like to stay stock...

Stage recovery mod will simulate an auto land for your strato launcher as long as you have fuel, a kerbal or probe core, and an engine.  It will also automatically recover any science, funds or Kerbals
